title: Effect Tokens

codeBlocks.code: {/* Glassmorphic card */}

content:
## Section 7: Effect Tokens ### 7.1 Box Shadows | Name | Value | Tailwind | Usage | |------|-------|----------|-------| | **sm** | `0 1px 2px 0 rgb(0 0 0 / 0.05)` | `shadow-sm` | Subtle elevation | | **base** | `0 1px 3px 0 rgb(0 0 0 / 0.1), 0 1px 2px -1px rgb(0 0 0 / 0.1)` | `shadow` | Default shadow | | **md** | `0 4px 6px -1px rgb(0 0 0 / 0.1), 0 2px 4px -2px rgb(0 0 0 / 0.1)` | `shadow-md` | Cards, panels | | **lg** | `0 10px 15px -3px rgb(0 0 0 / 0.1), 0 4px 6px -4px rgb(0 0 0 / 0.1)` | `shadow-lg` | **Primary buttons, elevated cards** | | **xl** | `0 20px 25px -5px rgb(0 0 0 / 0.1), 0 8px 10px -6px rgb(0 0 0 / 0.1)` | `shadow-xl` | Modals, drawers | | **2xl** | `0 25px 50px -12px rgb(0 0 0 / 0.25)` | `shadow-2xl` | Large modals | | **glow** | `0 0 20px rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.5)` | Custom | Glowing effects | --- ### 7.2 Border Radius | Name | Value | Rem | Pixels | Tailwind | Usage | |------|-------|-----|--------|----------|-------| | **sm** | 0.125rem | 0.125 | 2px | `rounded-sm` | Small elements, badges | | **md** | 0.375rem | 0.375 | 6px | `rounded-md` | Inputs, small buttons | | **lg** | 0.5rem | 0.5 | 8px | `rounded-lg` | Cards, panels | | **xl** | 0.75rem | 0.75 | 12px | `rounded-xl` | **Buttons, modals (DEFAULT)** | | **2xl** | 1rem | 1 | 16px | `rounded-2xl` | Large cards | | **3xl** | 1.5rem | 1.5 | 24px | `rounded-3xl` | Hero sections | | **full** | 9999px | - | - | `rounded-full` | Pills, avatars, badges | --- ### 7.3 Opacity Scale | Name | Value | Tailwind | Usage | |------|-------|----------|-------| | 0 | 0 | `opacity-0` | Hidden | | 10 | 0.1 | `opacity-10` | Very faint | | 20 | 0.2 | `opacity-20` | Faint overlays | | 50 | 0.5 | `opacity-50` | Disabled states | | 80 | 0.8 | `opacity-80` | Muted elements | | 90 | 0.9 | `opacity-90` | Nearly opaque | | 100 | 1 | `opacity-100` | **Fully opaque (DEFAULT)** | --- ### 7.4 Backdrop Blur | Name | Value | Tailwind | Usage | |------|-------|----------|-------| | **xs** | 2px | `backdrop-blur-xs` | Subtle blur | | **sm** | 4px | `backdrop-blur-sm` | Small blur | | **md** | 12px | `backdrop-blur-md` | Medium blur | | **lg** | 16px | `backdrop-blur-lg` | **Glass effect (DEFAULT)** | | **xl** | 24px | `backdrop-blur-xl` | Strong glass effect | | **2xl** | 40px | `backdrop-blur-2xl` | Very strong blur | **Glass Effect Pattern**: ```tsx
{/* Glassmorphic card */}
``` ---
